A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 9, 2010''', at 20:00&ndash;20:03 UTC.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(15:00:20) <Notch> updating indev now"..."(15:03:33) <Notch> it should be updated by now"''"</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[File:Hotbar.png|200px]] [[Hotbar]]'''
* The player now starts with 99 spring green cloth, 99 glass and 99 wooden planks in their hotbar, in addition to the already existing items.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(14:58:15) <Notch> I'll give you some wood to start with. And cloth."..."(14:58:29) <Visiiri> and glass!''"</ref>
